title: Yo! The tech industry in rap
description: A look at the best tech references in rap music.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

One of Marketplace Tech's favorite online posts this month was a list of songs that proves just how important tech has become to rap music. This piece was the brainchild of Leslie Horn, staff writer at Gizmodo, who joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to talk about some of their favorite songs.

"}]
teaser: A look at the best tech references in rap music.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 26, 2013
contentencoded: One of Marketplace Tech's favorite online posts this month was a list of songs that proves just how important tech has become to rap music. This piece was the brainchild of Leslie Horn, staff writer at Gizmodo, who joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to talk about some of their favorite songs.
